version_description: System enhancements to improve app performance.

•Discounts
•Updated product catalog
•Updated transaction preferences
•Learn videos
•Systems enhancements to improve application performance.

•Launch the app while on a phone call
•Updated in-app alerts
•System enhancements to improve application performance

• Improved Compatibility with iOS 8
• Updated Design
• System Enhancements to Improve Application Performance

• Support for more devices with our card reader
• System enhancements to improve application performance
• Updated SSL Certificate

• Support for more devices with our card reader
• System enhancements to improve application performance
• Removed ATM/Branch locator

• The SSL certificate has been renewed. Please update CMC on your device by 4/15.
• CMC will no longer log out a user if they switch to another application or receive a phone call during a transaction.
• When logging in, CMC will no longer erase a saved username if a user incorrectly enters their password.
• CMC is moving minimum iOS support to 7.1 (from iOS 6), so please ensure your iOS device is updated to the latest version.
Fixed a log out defect when CMC goes to the background or user receives a phone call during a transaction.

•This release of Chase Mobile Checkout allows support for EMV chip card transactions. Processing an EMV transaction requires the usage of an EMV capable reader and a mobile device meeting minimum requirements of iOS 7.1 and Bluetooth 4.0.
•Extended application time out for sales transactions.
•Improved application security with performance enhancements.

•Extended application time out for sales transactions to 12 hours.
•Updates made based on revised card brand requirements for EMV fall-back scenarios
•Improved application security with performance enhancements.

• Revised the transaction experience if a customer wants to leave a tip.
• Improved application security with performance enhancements.

This update delivers features all designed to improve how you engage with your customers:
• You can now add your company’s logo to your emailed receipts. Use your CMC account credentials to access Chase’s Online POS Terminal (OPT), to upload your logo and enable it on your receipts.
• CMC will now notify you that your password is about to expire up to five days in advance of the password’s expiration.
• In conjunction with the payment brands, CMC will no longer ask you to collect a signature from your customer if the mag stripe or chip transaction came from our EMV enabled card reader. If you choose to, you can adjust this optional setting in the app’s User Preferences.
• We adopted cleaner report search capabilities by streamlining the date-selector in the app’s calendar.

As always, we make security enhancements with every release to help protect you and your customers. Remember you can make sure you’re getting the very latest Chase Mobile Checkout has to offer by changing your personal device’s settings to update the application automatically.

• The application’s Learn section has been enhanced with FAQs and support for our EMV reader.
• The application’s minimum compatibility has been moved to iOS 8.0.
• We’ve improved the application’s security with performance enhancements.

• We’ve improved EMV chip card transaction processing, by reducing the time a chip card remains inserted in our card reader. Cardholders will be instructed to insert their card, and within seconds, the application will prompt them to remove their card.
• The application’s minimum compatibility is now iOS 9.0.
• We improved the application’s security with standard performance enhancements.

Remember, you can make sure you’re getting the very latest Chase Mobile Checkout has to offer by changing your personal device’s settings to update the app automatically.
• We’ve improved the sign-in process. You can now utilize the password manager in iOS 11, or third-party password managers, to store your access credentials and paste them directly into CMC’s log on page.
• We enhanced the application’s security and made several improvements to reliability and usability.

This update delivers features all designed to improve how you engage with your customers:
• You can now add your company’s logo to your emailed receipts. Use your CMC account credentials to access Chase’s Online POS Terminal (OPT), to upload your logo and enable it on your receipts.
• CMC will now notify you that your password is about to expire up to five days in advance of the password’s expiration.
• In conjunction with the payment brands, CMC will no longer ask you to collect a signature from your customer if the mag stripe or chip transaction came from our EMV enabled card reader. If you choose to, you can adjust this optional setting in the app’s User Preferences.
• We adopted cleaner report search capabilities by streamlining the date-selector in the app’s calendar.

As always, we make security enhancements with every release to help protect you and your customers. Remember you can make sure you’re getting the very latest Chase Mobile Checkout has to offer by changing your personal device’s settings to update the application automatically.

• Improved alert notifications
• Security and general reliability updates
• Updated learning content

• Bug fixes and security enhancements
• Improved support for existing and future mPOS hardware
